analytic.title: Note sur deux versions arabes de l’entretien du catholicos Timothée I avec le calife al-Mahdî

monogr.title: Studies on the Christian Arabic Heritage in Honour of Father Prof. Dr. Samir Khalil Samir S.I. at the Occasion of his Sixty-Fifth Birthday

body.bibl: Troupeau, Gérard. “Note Sur Deux Versions Arabes de l’entretien Du Catholicos Timothée I Avec Le Calife al-Mahdî.” In Studies on the Christian Arabic Heritage in Honour of Father Prof. Dr. Samir Khalil Samir S.I. at the Occasion of His Sixty-Fifth Birthday, edited by Rifaat Y. Ebied and Herman G. B. Teule, 217–20. Eastern Christian Studies 5. Leuven: Peeters, 2004.
